text: ‘ohu kerehi nidhanayak pahala viya yutu nove da, ese nætahot ohu samaga deva dutayaku pæminiya yutu nove dæyi ovun pavasa sitima hetuven numbage hadavata emagin pidanayata pat va tibiya di numba veta deva panivida lesa danvanu labana dæyin samahara eva (numba pracaraya nokota) ata hæra damannata puluvana. niyata vasayenma numba avavada karanneku pamani. tavada allah siyalu dæ veta bharakaruya
